subject: Re: [junit] Book Recommendations and Where to put tests?
msgSnippet: ... Seconded, although checking the archives for this list is usually a pain. :) -- J. B. Rainsberger, Diaspar Software Services http://www.diasparsoftware.com
messageBody:
